message.content:
cs.CL, cs.SI, cs.SD, cs.IR, cs.LG

This paper deals with natural language processing and social media analysis, which are both sub-fields of computer science. Specifically, it focuses on measuring, predicting, and visualizing short-term changes in word representation and usage in the VKontakte social network during the Russia-Ukraine crisis. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CL (Computation and Language), which deals with natural language processing and computational linguistics. Other likely sub-categories include cs.SI (Social and Information Networks), cs.SD (Sound and Music Computing), cs.IR (Information Retrieval), and cs.LG (Machine Learning), as these sub-fields are also relevant to the paper's topic.
